text: David Weisman (March 11, 1942 â€“ October 9, 2019) was an American movie director, producer, author, and graphic artist. He was known for directing the movie Ciao! Manhattan and for producing Kiss of the Spider Woman. Weisman was born in Binghamton, New York. Weisman died on October 9, 2019 of problems caused by the West Nile virus at a Los Angeles hospital, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from West Nile virus Category:Infectious disease deaths in Los Angeles Category:American artists Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Movie producers from New York (state) Category:Screenwriters from New York (state) Category:People from Binghamton, New York
title: David Weisman
